name: lab journal-Curie
description: This lab notebook is filled with the collective discoveries and refinements of a research team dedicated to harnessing the power of the ATOM!  It mostly pertains to fission power, but there's also schematics for plutonium cells and information on using them for normal batteries, and... schematics for a nuclear warhead.  You don't think you're ready to start a second Cataclysm, but the blueprints for the miniaturized handheld version on the next page might be useful...
